activities: We obtain personal information from users of our online, web client, professional client, and mobile services ("Services") when such users: (1) register to use our Services; (2) execute electronic contracts and records through our Services; (3) contact us with questions or for customer support; and (4) otherwise interact with us through our Services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: User data, whether online, offline or manually processed.
